game.name: Running Santa
game.description:
Christmas is just around the corner and like many others Santa is also excited about this occasion very much. He is already in rush since he is scared of being late to reach to the kids on the coming Christmas Eve. His path is full of obstacles and you are his only hope to help overcome multiple hurdles. Join Running Santa and get ready to help him collect as many gifts as possible! All you need to do is just put your fingers on the UP arrow key to guide him complete the mission!

We know that this is not a safe environment to run for Santa. However, your excellent jumping and running abilities will help him to clear all 21 levels in a friendly environment. Try to make him jump avoid all the obstacles you see on his way and collect the maximum possible gift items for his child in this brand new adventure game! His path is full of deadly spikes and mushrooms. Make sure that he will not fall down in any gap between the two platforms otherwise he will die and you will lose the game immediately. 

Grab enough gift items to clear your present level and unlock new levels in this html5 platform game! This will also help you to finish the present level with the highest score. The Christmas themed running game features colorful graphics, simple controls, entertaining gameplay and cool 21 levels to explore. Help Santa to wear his running shoes and run like a true runner by stretching his leg muscles! Be careful to time your moves to achieve your mission! Check out our more popular titles from the category of Christmas games for kids that are free to play, no download required!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Running Santa at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Platform games for best excitement and thrill in you!
